LanguageData.BiosculpterOccupantSpeed.label: biosculpter occupant speed
LanguageData.BiosculpterOccupantSpeed.description: A multiplier on how quickly this person will complete a biosculpter pod cycle.
LanguageData.CertaintyLossFactor.label: global certainty loss factor
LanguageData.CertaintyLossFactor.description: A multiplier on how much certainty this person loses when someone else tries to convert them away from their ideoligion.
LanguageData.ConversionPower.label: conversion power
LanguageData.ConversionPower.description: How effective this person is at converting others to their own ideoligion. When this person attempts to convert someone else, this value multiplies the amount of certainty the other person loses.
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChanceIndoorsDarkOffset.label: 근접 회피 확률 (실내/어두움)
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChanceIndoorsDarkOffset.descri: 어두운 실내에서 근접 회피 할때의 보정치입니다.
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChanceIndoorsLitOffset.label: 근접 회피 확률 (실내/밝음)
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChanceIndoorsLitOffset.descrip: An offset on melee dodge chance if the target is indoors and lit.
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChanceOutdoorsDarkOffset.label: 근접 회피 확률 (실외/어두움)
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChanceOutdoorsDarkOffset.descr: 어두운 실외에서 근접 회피 할때의 보정치입니다.
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChanceOutdoorsLitOffset.label: 근접 회피 확률 (실외/밝음)
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChanceOutdoorsLitOffset.descri: 밝은 실외에서 근접 회피 할때의 보정치입니다.
LanguageData.MeleeHitChanceIndoorsDarkOffset.label: 근접공격 명중률 (실내/어두움)
LanguageData.MeleeHitChanceIndoorsDarkOffset.descript: 어두운 실내에서 근접 공격을 할때의 명중률 보정치입니다.
LanguageData.MeleeHitChanceIndoorsLitOffset.label: 근접공격 명중률 (실내/밝음)
LanguageData.MeleeHitChanceIndoorsLitOffset.descripti: 불로 밝혀진 실내에서 근접 공격을 할때의 명중률 보정치입니다.
LanguageData.MeleeHitChanceOutdoorsDarkOffset.label: 근접공격 명중률 (실외/어두움)
LanguageData.MeleeHitChanceOutdoorsDarkOffset.descrip: 어두운 실외에서 근접 공격을 할때의 명중률 보정치입니다.
LanguageData.MeleeHitChanceOutdoorsLitOffset.label: 근접공격 명중률 (실외/밝음)
LanguageData.MeleeHitChanceOutdoorsLitOffset.descript: An offset on melee hit chance if the target is outdoors during the day.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyIndoorsDarkOffset.label: shooting accuracy indoors dark
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyIndoorsDarkOffset.descri: An offset on shooting accuracy if the target is indoors in the dark.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyIndoorsLitOffset.label: shooting accuracy indoors lit
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyIndoorsLitOffset.descrip: An offset on shooting accuracy if the target is indoors and lit.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyOutdoorsDarkOffset.label: shooting accuracy outdoors dark
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyOutdoorsDarkOffset.descr: An offset on shooting accuracy if the target is outdoors at night.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyOutdoorsLitOffset.label: shooting accuracy outdoors lit
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyOutdoorsLitOffset.descri: An offset on shooting accuracy if the target is outdoors during the day.
LanguageData.SocialIdeoSpreadFrequencyFactor.label: ideoligion spread chance
LanguageData.SocialIdeoSpreadFrequencyFactor.descript: A multiplier on the chance that this person will try to convert other people to their own ideoligion.
